title: Finding the Highndry
atmosphere: Desolate volcanic landscape. The ship sits alone in the crater, weathered but intact. There's a sense of isolation and accomplishment.
description: The Travellers finally reach their prize. The Highndry waits in the crater, disabled but salvageable. Now the real work begins.
objectives: Locate the Highndry in the crater

triggers.exit: Ship assessed, repair plan made, survey begins

ship_condition.exterior: Weathered but structurally sound. Some scoring from volcanic debris.
ship_condition.power_plant: Offline. Fuel cells depleted. Primary issue.

repair_requirements.immediate: Fuel - can be refined from water/atmosphere
repair_requirements.calibration: Jump drive needs recalibration before use

narrator_prompt: There she is. The Highndry. A Type S Scout/Courier, registry S00164-2, sitting in the crater like a forgotten promise. Months of exposure have dulled her hull, but she's still a starship. Your starship. Now you just have to make her fly again.
